alert.note: Alert for Central Tularosa Basin; Otero Mesa; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet; Southern Tularosa Basin; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 5:47PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong outflow boundary will impact portions of southwestern Otero County through 645 PM MDT... At 544 PM MDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong outflow boundary near Holloman Air Force Base, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds will create areas of blowing dust which will reduce visibilities in spots along US54 and US70. In addition the winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chaparral, White Sands National Monument, Orogrande, Sunspot, Alamogordo, McGregor Range Base, Holloman Air Force Base, Boles Acres, Oliver Lee State Park and The Otero Mesa. This includes the following highways... Highway 70 in New Mexico between mile markers 180 and 210. Highway 54 in New Mexico between mile markers 1 and 63. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Tularosa Basin; Otero Mesa; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet; Southern Tularosa Basin; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet
